mapper.select: SELECT LLAPPC /* 신청자코드 */ , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') || 'W' || LPAD(SQ_IFIN_SPP_MAT_SEND_ETXT$LLORNO.NEXTVAL, 6, '0') AS LLORNO /* 주문번호 */ FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT LLAPPC FROM TB_IFIN_KSS_QOM_ASN_SEND_TEMP /* KSS물량배정송신전문 */ WHERE LLORNO IS NULL ) T1

update.foreach:
UPDATE TB_IFIN_KSS_QOM_ASN_SEND_TEMP /* KSS물량배정송신전문 */ SET LLORNO = #{item.llorno} /* 주문번호 */
WHERE LLORNO IS NULL AND LLAPPC = #{item.llappc} /* 신청자코드 */
